articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Celebrated
						
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- An art performance took place at plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Saturday to celebrate the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. It was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. 
					 The numbers of the art performance which began with narration and chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Il" included "Sound of Footsteps of the General" and "Ongheya of Victory of Songun". 
					
					 The performers praised the undying revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il who was making a long journey of forced march for the country and people and demonstrated a firm faith and will of the young Songun vanguard to fully display their wisdom and courage in defending the country and building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country Saturday to celebrate the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Their venues in Pyongyang including plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium were crowded with youth and students.
					
					 The dancing places were replete with deep reverence of youth and students for Kim Jong Il who raised the position of the DPRK to the highest level and is ushering in a new era of prosperity with his great Songun politics.
					
					 The parties began amid the playing of the song "Please Receive Best Wishes of People." They danced to the tune of such songs as "Let's Sing of General Dear to People," "Twelve Months for Songun Victory," "Let Us Become the General's Soldiers" and "Let Us Meet at the Front." 
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in Phyongsong of South Phyongan Province, Sariwon of North Hwanghae Province, Kanggye of Jagang Province and other provincial seats and cities and counties.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Marathon Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Marathon Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The participants in the IAAF-24th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue and paid homage to the President.

articles.title: Documentary Film Shown
articles.content:
Documentary Film Shown
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary film "They Are Together on the Way of the Great Songun Leadership" was shown at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.
					The film impressively shows the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by strengthening and developing the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 It stresses that the revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great men who defended the destiny of the country and nation and brought about a heyday of the country's prosperity under the banner of Songun would shine long along.
					
					 Among the audience were senior state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Guests Here
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and guests arrived here on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the delegation of the Association for the Study of the DPRK of Moscow State University led by its Chairman Pavel Reshakov, the delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea led by its Vice-chairman Dmitri Model, the delegation of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea led by its Chief Muhammad Berkat Ullah and  the youth delegation of the Study for the Juche Idea of Brazil led by Gabriel Goncalves Martinez.
					
					 Jean-Francois Mancel, member of the National Assembly under the People's Movement Union of France, and his party arrived here on the same day as guest of honor of the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 Also arriving here Saturday were art troupes and foreign artistes to participate in the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 They included the Moscow Classical Ballet of Russia, the Famous Artistes from Moscow Grand Theater of Russia,  the Merited Artist Varvara and Ensemble "Oberg" of Russia, the Circus of State Acrobatic Company of Russia, the Nikulin Moscow Circus of Moscow, German Soloists of Creusen Concert, the Folk Art Troupe "Izvor De Valcea" of Romania, the Famous Group of the Famous Artists from State Symphony Orchestra of Mongolia, the Soloists of "Orfei"  Group from the Sophia Opera Theater of Bulgaria, the Soloists Ensemble "Classic Avantguard" of Belorus, musicians of Finland, the guitar trio of Cuba and the Vienna Wind Players of Austria.
					
					 Earlier arrivals included the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France, the Dance Troupe of Kiev Dance Theater of Ukraine and the "Step-Class" Dance Troupe of Ukraine.

articles.title: Measures Taken to Prevent Forest Fires
articles.content:
Measures Taken to Prevent Forest Fires
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has taken measures to prevent forest fires from breaking out in spring.
					 The Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation has updated the existing forest fire monitoring system for streaming distribution of necessary information to all provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 After setting up a comprehensive system for preventing forest fires in the Mt. Paektu area, the ministry has introduced it in all other parts of the country. 
					
					 It has also renewed fire-forecasting software, installed more monitoring cameras and built more forest fire centers in all areas.  
					
					 Combined headquarters involving officials of government and judicial organs and working people's organizations are active in all areas in spring to prevent forest fires.

articles.title: Guidelines for Development of Fruit Farming
articles.content:
Guidelines for Development of Fruit Farming
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Fifty years has elapsed since President Kim Il Sung published the work "On Planting Orchards through an All-people Movement".  
					 He, delivering a concluding speech at an enlarged meeting of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea held on April 7, Juche 50 (1961) in Pukchong County, South Hamgyong Province, indicated ways for developing fruit farming in the country.
					
					 After the meeting, he took measures to bring into full play the zeal of the agricultural working people, strengthen nationwide assistance to fruit farming and introduce machines and chemicals in fruit culture on a modern basis.
					
					 He also took measures to replace existing fruit trees with those of good species and organize a pomological institute and experimental farms.
					
					 Under his leadership, orchards covering tens of thousands of hectares were newly cultivated throughout the country in 1961 and the area of fruit farms increased 1.5 times in 1963 compared with three years ago.

articles.title: New Cooking Method
articles.content:
New Cooking Method
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- New cooking methods were introduced at the 16th April Holiday Food Festival held in Pyongyang some days ago.
					One of them is preparing dishes with smoke-turned liquid seasoning. The method was presented by Pyongyang Hotel.
					
					 Meat or fish is injected with the seasoning several times, kept or dried at different temperatures and then smoked in an oven at 120 to 140 degrees centigrade for 40 minutes.
					
					 Dishes prepared by this method are nutritive and free from noxious substances.

articles.title: Li Changchun on Boosting Sino-DPRK Friendly Relations
articles.content:
Li Changchun on Boosting Sino-DPRK Friendly Relations
 Beijing, April 7 (KCNA) -- Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, Thursday paid a courtesy call on Li Changchun, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					At the meeting Li Changchun said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China twice last year, meeting with President Hu Jintao and further boosting the bilateral friendly relations, adding that this year he received State Councilor Meng Jianzhu during his visit to the DPRK and enjoyed a concert given by the Unhasu Orchestra together with the staff members of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang and even arranged a dinner for them on the occasion of the January 15th of the lunar calendar.
					
					 This powerfully demonstrated the vitality of the Sino-DPRK friendship before the whole world and greatly encouraged the people of the two countries, he noted.
					
					 It is the invariable policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily consolidate and develop the friendly relations between China and the DPRK and this is the strategic choice of both countries, he stressed.
					
					  2012 is a significant year which will mark the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, he said, expressing belief that the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il would make this year a shining year when they will make a bigger step forward in the efforts to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group's Abduction of Inhabitants of DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group's Abduction of Inhabitants of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The operations of the group of traitors in south Korea to abduct inhabitants of the DPRK have gone into extremes. 
					 The group persistently conducted an operation to force four fishermen of the DPRK to "defect" to the south though they had gone adrift to the south side owing to rough waves early in February and finally detained them there. On March 24, it abducted several citizens of the DPRK under the cloak of "planned defection from the north" by hiring ultra-right religious organizations. 
					
					 The group put up the card of "defectors from the north" in a bid to cover up its criminal acts but the operations of the above-said organizations were brought to light and there surfaced such problem as "planned smuggling," throwing it into utter dismay. 
					
					 What did the puppet group seek through the operations to abduct citizens of the DPRK while coming under fire by the public at home and abroad for turning down its every proposal for dialogue this year? 
					
					 Its aim is to evade the responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations into an unprecedented collapse and tarnish the international image of the DPRK. This is highly ridiculous. 
					
					 The method employed by the group is too mean when assuming that it tried to do harm to the idea and system of the DPRK which its people regard as their life and soul. 
					
					 Most of "the defectors from the north" touted by the group were lured and abducted by the south Korean authorities and pro-U.S. right-wing conservative forces in an organized and planned manner in disregard of their will or wishes. 
					
					 It is nobody's secret that the south Korean authorities have long conducted operations to abduct inhabitants of the DPRK by all conspiratorial methods after laying a dense network of its intelligence agents, organizations for anti-DPRK operations under the guise of "organizations for rescuing defectors from the north" and hired abductors in the areas close to the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are crafty enough to conduct the above-said operations by disguising intelligence and plot-breeding organizations as "non-governmental ones." 
					
					 Intolerable are the operations to lure and abduct citizens of the DPRK as they are a product of the hostile forces' anti-DPRK campaign to stifle Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses. 
					
					 The group of traitors is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can get something through the despicable anti-DPRK scenario.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Observed
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The future of the DPRK is immensely rosy as it is led by Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu Kim Jong Il, the peerless patriot and rare political elder.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an editorial marking the 18th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The election of Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission provided a sure guarantee for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the greatest-ever commander with literary and military accomplishments, talent and noble virtues and general type great statesman. He has made long journeys for the Songun guidance for several decades, regarding arms as the best weapon for the revolution since his early years, and performed shining feats in the building of a powerful country in the era of independence by skillfully combining politics and military affairs.
					
					  He has left giant footprints for Songun revolutionary leadership, shouldering upon himself the heavy responsibility as chairman of the NDC. This long period remains shining as an ever-victorious history in which the country has held aloft the socialist red flag of Juche, standing all tests of history,  and as a course of leap forward in which the country's  overall national power has dramatically grown strong and a great heyday for prosperity has arrived at this land.
					
					The DPRK led by Kim Jong Il is an independent power powerfully demonstrating the dignity and spirit of the nation by relying on the matchless military capability, the country characterized by single-minded unity where the headquarters of the revolution and all the servicepersons and people are single-mindedly united and the country pulsating with uninterrupted leap forward and changes. 
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK feel confident of the victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche, when seeing the stirring reality of the country making a long drive under his Songun leadership, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Urge Hyon In Thaek to Come out for N-S Dialogue
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Urge Hyon In Thaek to Come out for N-S Dialogue
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The representatives of the seven orders belonging to the Peace Council of Religionists of south Korea met with Minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek on April 4 and urged him to positively come out for the north-south dialogue, according to CBS of south Korea. 
					 It is necessary to restore the relations of confidence between the south and the north as early as possible to achieve the peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula and peace in Northeast Asia, they held. 
					
					 They declared that the authorities should come out for dialogue with the north without delay to defuse tension and confrontation on the peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Declare All-out Anti-"Government" Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Declare All-out Anti-"Government" Struggle
						
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of Trade Unions at a meeting in Seoul on April 6 declared that it would launch an all-out anti-"government" struggle in protest against the unpopular rule of the authorities.
					 The struggle will deal a heavy blow at the present regime's anti-worker policy, the organization noted.
					
					 What we can give this narrow-minded regime is nothing but a judgment to be meted out through actions, it said.
					
					 We will certainly judge the anti-worker "government" for depriving the workers of the basic right to labor while trampling down upon them like a pair of old shoes, it warned.
					
					 It said that it would hold a 200,000-strong workers rally on May 1 and stage solidarity actions to judge the "Grand National Party" in various regions.

articles.title: Concern over Radioactive Damage Grows in S. Korea
articles.content:
Concern over Radioactive Damage Grows in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Concern over the radioactive damage is growing in south Korea, according to its MBC on April 7.
					 That day it rained in all areas all day long, it noted, saying that such spring rainfall would usually be welcomed as sweet or honey one but this time people were displeased with it for fear of radioactive damage.
					
					 In facts, the level of radioactive substances such as iodine and cesium, detected in the rain on Jeju Island that morning, is higher than previously detected one, it reported.
					
					 The spring rain that day is arousing people's concern about radioactive damage, it added.

articles.title: Solution of Issue of People's Living Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Solution of Issue of People's Living Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Pak Ji Won, floor leader of the Democratic Party of south Korea, addressing the session of the "National Assembly" on April 5, urged Lee Myung Bak to take hands off politics and focus his efforts on settling the problem of people's living in the remainder of the tenure of his office, according to south Korean KBS. 
					 South Korea is in the grip of crisis in all fields including democracy, economy and south-north relations and it is urgent to solve at an early date the problem of the people's living, in particular, he stressed.

articles.title: WPK and Korean People's Struggle Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
WPK and Korean People's Struggle Supported in Mexico
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations of Mexico including the People's Socialist Party and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association released a joint statement on April 1 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country", the work of President Kim Il Sung.
					The statement praised the undying feats performed by the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, in the struggle to achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The 10-point programme which reflected the noble and patriotic intention of the President is an immortal great programme for reunification as it ushered in the historic June 15 era of reunification, it said, and went on:
					
					 We express the expectation and conviction that all the Koreans will wage a more dynamic struggle to improve the inter-Korean relations and reunify the country under the slogan "Let all Koreans in the north, south and abroad join efforts and bring a new phase of independent reunification!" this year.
					
					 We highly estimate the invariable and patriotic efforts of the WPK and the DPRK government to improve the inter-Korean relations through national unity and cooperation and achieve a peaceful reunification and fully support the recent proposal of the DPRK for dialogue to reunify the country.
					
					 We call upon the political parties, governments and organizations of all countries, international bodies and progressives aspiring after the improved north-south relations and reunification of Korea to voice more powerful support for the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the cause of national reunification according to the 10-point programme and the historic north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between March 26 and April 5 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 They included meeting, seminar, film show, photo exhibition and DPRK book, photo and fine art exhibitions held in Mongolia, Ethiopia and Bulgaria.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of the President and Kim Jong Il, books and photos introducing the feats performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and photos and fine art pieces on the Korean people's successes made in the efforts to build a socialist thriving nation.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the Mongolian College of Culture said that the Juche Idea founded by Kim Il Sung is the great idea which occupies the most brilliant page in the history of human thought, adding that the Korean people have won only victories under the banner of the Juche Idea.
					
					 He praised the Korean people for having augmented the power of the country and achieved great successes in the efforts to build a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The manager of the Sofia City Cultural Center of Bulgaria said that he was pleased to have an opportunity to know better about the great achievements made by the Korean people on the road chosen by themselves and in their work for social progress.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched such DPRK films as "The Country Shining Thanks to Arms of Mt. Paektu", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Mt. Kuwol, Scenic Spot on the West Coast."

articles.title: 10-point Programme of Great National Unity Supported
articles.content:
10-point Programme of Great National Unity Supported
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Personages of Finland and Norway released statements on April 2 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country."
					 The chairman of the Finland-Korea Society in his statement said that Kim Il Sung advanced the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation calling on all the Koreans to unite irrespective of ideology, political view and religious belief.
					
					The patriotic idea and line on great national unity advanced by the President are being further developed in depth by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he stressed, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and opened an epochal phase of independent reunification and great national unity. This is an event to be recorded specially in the history of the Korean people's reunification movement.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would consolidate the national unity under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and thus certainly achieve the historic cause of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The chairman of the Friendship Society Norway-Korea stressed that Kim Il Sung consistently maintained the line for national reunification all his life and set forth the proposals and principles for driving foreign forces out of south Korea and reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 He reiterated his invariable support to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated 
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Peru and Bangladesh issued bulletins on March 31 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The Peruvian People's Women Union carried photos on the revolutionary activities of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and an article in its bulletin.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great thinker, distinguished statesman, gifted strategist and world political elder.
					
					 Born in Mangyongdae on April 15, 1912, he acquired qualifications and personality as a great revolutionary under the revolutionary influence of his parents.
					
					 It is thanks to his great idea that the Korean people have consolidated and developed socialism, adhering to the revolutionary principle. 
					
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea carried in its bulletin an article titled "Banner of great unity of whole nation".
					
					 The President enunciated the idea of great national unity and thoroughly embodied it.
					
					 The reunification movement of the Korean people which has dynamically advanced under the banner of great national unity would be unthinkable without the leadership of the President who invariably held fast to the idea of independence and unity and successfully embodied it.
					
					 The President's cause of great national unity is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Mexico
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was published in a booklet by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 2.
					 This work published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993) clarifies the issues of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation, achieving unity on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and putting a halt to all political strifes stirring up the division and confrontation between fellow countrymen.
					
					 It also indicates overall ways for achieving great national unity including the matters of achieving confidence and unity between the north and the south, refraining from rejecting each other because of differing ism and joining hands with each other on the road of national reunification. 
					
					 In the meantime, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted the full text of this work on its Internet homepage on March 31.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised 
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Cambodia and Spain from March 23 to April 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They included a meeting to remember the President and a photo exhibition in Cambodia and a lecture in Spain.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, said that Kim Il Sung was the closest friend of Great King Norodom Sihanouk and the Cambodian people.
					
					 The Cambodian people boundlessly revere the President and always remember the material and moral support sent by him, he said.
					
					 I am pleased that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between Cambodia and the DPRK are steadily growing stronger and hope that these relations would continue to grow strong and develop in the future, too, he noted.
					
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, introduced the brief history of the revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 The validity and great vitality of the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by the President have been fully demonstrated through the reality of the DPRK, he said.
					
					 The DPRK is the socialist system centered on the popular masses in which all social benefits including free education and free medical care are provided and a land of bliss for the people, he added.

articles.title: CPC Official on Establishing Party Discipline and Combating Corruption
articles.content:
CPC Official on Establishing Party Discipline and Combating Corruption
						
 Beijing, April 7 (KCNA) -- It is necessary to intensify the work to establish party discipline, enforce clean-handed politics and combat corruption, said He Guoqiang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and secretary of the CPC Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, in his recent speech at the Party School of the CPC Central Committee.
					 He called on leading officials at all levels to make their ideology and action consistent with the instructions of the CPC Central Committee and commit themselves to establish political discipline, enforce clean-handed politics and improve corruption prevention mechanism while strengthening the work for the economic and social development of their units.
					
					 He stressed the special need to maintain the principle of setting an example in the work, improve the work style and lead an upright and honest life.

articles.title: Chinese Defense Minister Stresses Need to Strengthen Militia Work
articles.content:
Chinese Defense Minister Stresses Need to Strengthen Militia Work
 Beijing, April 7 (KCNA) -- Chinese State Councillor and Minister of National Defense Liang Guanglie recently acquainted himself with the work of the militia in Sichuan Province and underlined the need to strengthen it under a new situation.
					 He called for thoroughly implementing the scientific view on development in strengthening the militia work and acquiring greater sense of responsibility to bring about a new phase in the work.

articles.title: China Issues Revised Regulations on Army Secrets
articles.content:
China Issues Revised Regulations on Army Secrets 
 Beijing, April 7 (KCNA) -- China recently issued revised regulations on keeping secrets of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.
					 The regulations supplemented and completed various systems and rules for keeping secrets of the army under a new situation on the basis of a series of important instructions given by President Hu Jintao and the Central Military Commission.
					
					 The Chinese army is obliged to abide by these regulations which will take effect from May 1.

articles.title: China Strives to Improve Standard of Poor People's Living
articles.content:
China Strives to Improve Standard of Poor People's Living
						
 Beijing, April 7 (KCNA) -- China is making sustained big efforts to improve the living conditions of the people in poor areas.
					 According to a recent announcement made by the Poverty Relief Office of the State Council of China, various steps for economic development have been taken to improve the standard of people's living in poverty areas across the country in the past five years, which made it possible to improve the standard of living of 37.43 million people residing there.
					
					 The country is paying deep attention to settling the issue of drinking water for the inhabitants in the poverty areas, in particular.
					
					 Guizhou Province is pushing forward the reservoir building and a project for laying water pipes while Hebei Province is operating the group for digging wells for the inhabitants in the mountainous areas.
					
					 Tibet Autonomous Region is carrying out the project for laying new water pipes while Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Sichuan and other provinces and autonomous regions in the western areas are pushing ahead with the projects of digging wells and building pumping stations.
					
					 The country is massively building "hopeful primary schools" to develop the basic education in the poverty areas.
					
					 The number of such schools in operation across the country reached 16,345 as of July last year.
					
					 The country worked out a plan to basically remove poverty by 2020 and is intensifying scientific and technological dissemination in the said areas and, at the same time, is stepping up the construction of basic facilities including railways and roads.

articles.title: Israel's Moves to Expand Jewish Settlements Denounced
articles.content:
Israel's Moves to Expand Jewish Settlements Denounced 
						
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Jordanian Foreign Minister Nasser Judeh on Wednesday condemned Israel's settlement activities for impeding the peace efforts.
					 The Jordanian official condemned Israel's unilateral, illegal and provocative measures in the occupied Palestinian territories.
					
					 He demanded the Israeli authorities stop at once all the unilateral steps against Palestine.
					
					 The aide to the chief of the Palestinian National Authority on Monday condemned Israel's plan to develop four settlements in the West Bank and its approval of at least 940 housing projects in East Jerusalem settlements.
					
					 "These steps reflect the Israeli government's urgency to continue destroying any chance for resuming the peace process," said the aide.
					
					 France warned Israel against the plan to expand settlement in West Bank, the French Foreign Ministry said Monday.

articles.title: Iranian President Raps Intervention of Western Countries
articles.content:
Iranian President Raps Intervention of Western Countries
 Tehran, April 7 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad on April 4 bitterly criticized the intervention of Western countries and the U.S. in the Middle East issues.
					 He said "the intervention of some European countries and the U.S. in the regional states has raised concerns and complicated the situation."
					
					 He also criticized the double standard of the U.S. and other Western countries concerning the regional issues including Palestinian one.

articles.title: Ahmadinejad Slashes at US Wrong Policies
articles.content:
Ahmadinejad Slashes at US Wrong Policies
 Tehran, April 7 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad blasted the U.S. administration for its deceitful policies.
					 Speaking at a press conference in Tehran on Monday, he said that the difference between Bush and Obama lies in the fact that the current U.S. president uses force and at the same time deception and conspiracy unlike Bush who clearly resorted to weapon and military action.
					
					 Obama will have to leave the scene of politics with much more shame, he stated.

articles.title: Arbitration Role of US and Other Countries Rejected
articles.content:
Arbitration Role of US and Other Countries Rejected
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of Pakistan expressed the stand of the country which rejected any arbitration of the U.S. and other countries in the recent resumption of the peace dialogue with India.
					 The spokesman said that Pakistan and India do not feel the need of other countries' role in solving the problem between the two countries.

articles.title: US Subsidies to Boeing Inconsistent with Trade Rules
articles.content:
US Subsidies to Boeing Inconsistent with Trade Rules
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The World Trade Organization recently released a report ruling that U.S. subsidies for Boeing were unfair. 
					 According to the report, after years of investigation into the request by the European Union the WTO has ruled that U.S. subsidies to Boeing are inconsistent with its trade rules. It urged the U.S. government to take appropriate steps at once.

articles.title: Ecuador Expels US Ambassador
articles.content:
Ecuador Expels US Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Ecuador's government recently decided to expel the U.S. ambassador to the country. 
					 Foreign Minister Ricardo Patino Tuesday announced at a press conference that the U.S. ambassador groundlessly heaped slanders and calumnies on the National Police chief. 
					
					 In this regard Ecuador's government declared the U.S. ambassador to the country "persona non grata" and asked her to leave the country as soon as possible, he said.

articles.title: 3rd Bridge over Panama Canal to Cost 300 Million Dollars
articles.content:
3rd Bridge over Panama Canal to Cost 300 Million Dollars
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Panama will build a third bridge across the Panama Canal at a cost of about 300 million U.S. dollars, its foreign minister said Tuesday.

articles.title: Moderate Quake Hits Southern Indonesia
articles.content:
Moderate Quake Hits Southern Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A moderate earthquake measuring 5.4 Richter scale rocked southern Indonesia on Tuesday.
					 The tremor was centered at 83 kilometers southeast of Ujung Kulon area.

articles.title: Volcano Erupts in Kamchatka, Russia
articles.content:
Volcano Erupts in Kamchatka, Russia
 Moscow, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Shebeluts volcano erupted in Kamchatka, Russia on April 6.
					 Volcano ashes rose as high as 7,500 m above the sea level while the volcano erupted.
					
					 It was reported that quake lasted for over 30 minutes while the volcano erupted.

articles.title: Food Prices Jump Worldwide
articles.content:
Food Prices Jump Worldwide
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of people are suffering from poverty due to the worldwide rise of food prices.
					 The UN recently quoted a survey as saying that the number of those who are suffering from poverty due to the sharp rise of food prices reached about 20 million in the Asia-Pacific region alone last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas y empresas de provincia de Jagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia subsidios escolares y becas a hijos de coreanos en Japon
						
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 99 del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) los subsidios escolares y becas equivalentes a 165 millones 200 mil yen.(moneda japonesa) para la educacion nacional democratica de los hijos de los coreanos radicados en Japon.
					El monto de tales fondos, enviados en 157 ocasiones por el Presidente y el Dirigente hasta la fecha, llega a 46 mil 759 millones 450 mil 390 yen.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe carta de Alejandro Cao De Benos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe carta de Alejandro Cao De Benos
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio la carta que con motivo del centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung le dirigiera el 31 de marzo el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea, Alejandro Cao De Benos, en representacion del comite preparatorio de esta entidad para esa efemeride.
					La carta subraya que la vida revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung es la sagrada historia del mas eminente revolucionario quien con perspicacia extraordinaria, capacidad de direccion y gran influencia moral, realizo las inmortales hazanas en el cumplimiento de la causa independiente del pueblo trabajador.
					
					Prosigue que el es el salvador de la nacion quien con el mas sublime y cordial ideal de amor por la patria y la nacion libro dinamicas actividades hasta el ultimo momento de su vida y abrio amplio camino capaz de realizar la reunificacion de Corea y es el veterano de la politica mundial quien hizo gran aporte a la lucha por realizar la causa de independencia de todo el mundo.
					
					Subraya que la noble causa de independencia del Presidente la lleva adelante el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y Corea socialista brilla como el pais del Songun y el farol de esperanza de los pueblos progresistas del mundo bajo su sabia direccion.
					
					Senala que a traves de la exposicion de libros y fotos de Internet, pudieron conocer profundamente las inmortales hazanas del Presidente realizadas ante la revolucion coreana y la causa de independencia del mundo, la invencibilidad de Corea del Songun y la justeza de la lucha del pueblo coreano que lleva a cabo la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista siguiendo al jalon de la historia indicado por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il.
					
					Destaca que la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea librara con mas vigor el movimiento de solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
					
					Por ultimo, manifiesta la conviccion de que bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente, el pueblo coreano abrira ciertamente las puertas a la gran potencia prospera frustrando todos los desafios de la historia.

articles.title: RPDC tomara nuevas medidas para el turismo al monte Kumgang
articles.content:
RPDC tomara nuevas medidas para el turismo al monte Kumgang
						
  Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 8 una declaracion con respecto a que pasan tres anos desde cuando las autoridades surcoreanas suspendieron unilateralmente el turismo al monte Kumgang. 
					   Es deplorable que el turismo al monte Kumgang, que vino realizandose durante un decenio como simbolo de la cooperacion Norte-Sur y de la reunificacion, haya sido suspendido a menos de 5 meses de mandato de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					   Ya esta conocido que las autoridades surcoreanas eluden la reanudacion del turismo no por la preocupacion de la seguridad personal de los turistas, sino con el fin de bloquear la llamada "fuente de ingreso" de alguien. 
					
					   Esto es intolerable insulto y burla a la parte Norte y a toda la nacion coreana.
					
					   Hemos concedido al Sur de Corea todas las prerrogativas posibles en el turismo al monte Kumgang y por eso esta labor nos resulto deficitaria practicamente.
					
					   Hemos soportado casi tres anos. Ya no hay ninguna posibilidad de que se reanude el turismo al monte Kumgang. 
					
					   Por lo tanto, nos vimos obligados a ejercer nuestro derecho como signatario de acuerdo, en virtud de la ley de la RPDC y del derecho internacional.
					
					   Avisamos a la parte de Hyundai la siguiente posicion nuestra y le entregamos un documento oficial correspondiente:
					
					   Anularemos del acuerdo sobre el turismo al monte Kumgang, firmado entre nuestra parte y el Grupo Hyundai, la vigencia del articulo sobre el monopolio concedido a la parte de Hyundai. El turismo al monte Kumgang por via Norte estara a cargo de nuestra parte y lo podemos autorizar a un socio extranjero y el turismo por via Sur lo encargara de continuo el Grupo Hyundai. 
					
					   Segun ello, el CCPAP y la Direccion de Desarrollo Integral de Lugares Famosos propusieron a un organo competente de la RPDC tomar las medidas legales sobre el turismo al monte Kumgang. 
					
					   Se tomaran pronto las correspondientes medidas estatales de acuerdo con la reestructuracion del turismo.
					
					   La parte de Hyundai perdio su monopolio debido a la campana de las autoridades surcoreanas orientada al enfrentamiento fratricida y a la quiebra del turismo. 
					
					   La confianza y la cooperacion entre nosotros y el Grupo Hyundai continuaran en lo adelante tambien,  Es invariable nuestra posicion de permitir a los habitantes surcoreanos el turismo al monte Kumgang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora el 9 de abril
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora el 9 de abril 
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion de este sabado un editorial dedicado al 18o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Gracias a contar con el Dirigente, patriota y veterano politico sin igual y destacado general del Songun del monte Paektu, es muy radiante el futuro de Corea, comienza el editorial y continua:
					
					La eleccion del Dirigente en dicho cargo permitio preparar la garantia principal para la prosperidad de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y el coronamiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					El Dirigente es el distinguido comandante y gran politico excelente en la pluma y la espada y dotado de talento y virtud.
					
					Durante varios decenios el Dirigente esta en el camino del Songun considerando el fusil como el arma omnipotente de la revolucion y realizo imborrables proezas en la construccion de la potencia de la epoca de independencia al combinar excelentemente la politica y los asuntos militares. 
					
					En esos largos tiempos, en que el Dirigente dejo sus nobles huellas de direccion sobre la revolucion del Songun con el cargo importante del Presidente del CDN, nuestra patria enarbola la bandera roja socialista del Juche superando todas las vicisitudes de la historia, fortaleciendo el poderio estatal en todas las esferas y abriendo la era de prosperidad. 
					
					La RPDC, guiada por el Dirigente, es la potencia de independencia que exalta la dignidad y el impetu de la nacion ateniendose al invencible poderio militar, el pais de unidad monolitica entre la Direccion de la Revolucion y todos los militares y civiles, y el creador de incesantes saltos e innovaciones. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea aseguran el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche viendo la majestuosa realidad de la patria que sale victoriosa bajo la guia del Songun del Dirigente.
